text: Phonism I ( 幻听 I ) is a work for 10 performers, composed by He Xuntian in 1989. ==Summary== He Xuntian adopted RD Composition and Theory of Musical Dimension in his work Phonism I. ==First performance== 2 April 1991, Paradiso Amsterdam, Netherlands Netherlands Nieow Ensemble ==References== Category:Compositions by He Xuntian Category:Chamber music compositions Category:1989 compositions
title: Phonism I
